price: Kí ni kò jẹ́ kí àwọn àlùfáà àti àwọn amòfin ẹ̀sìn máa kọ̀ fún wọn nípa ọ̀rọ̀ ẹnu wọn (tí ó jẹ́) ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ àti jíjẹ tí wọ́n ń jẹ owó èrú! Dájúdájú ohun tí wọ́n ń ṣe níṣẹ́ burú.
arabic: لَوۡلَا يَنۡهَىٰهُمُ ٱلرَّبَّٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلۡأَحۡبَارُ عَن قَوۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: lawlā yanhāhumu al-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru ʿan qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
